title: Japan - Sans Serif
content:
This is really similar to everything that I have thought it would be but the x-heights on the cross bars of the “A” and the bowl of the J just do not seem to match anything.

author: Wesley.Bancroft

comments.content: The closest I can think of (which is not a cigar) is [Eurostile Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203175550/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/eurostile_lt_std_bold_ot/).
